about_the_game:
Enter a vast world full of mysterious creatures and exciting battles! In Tokiros, you will take on the role of a Hunter, a skilled adventurer who explores wild lands in search of legendary creatures. Capture, train, and evolve your team of unique monsters, each with their own abilities and traits, to form the perfect squad.

Main Features:

Exploration and Capture:

Travel through enchanted forests, desolate deserts, dark caves, and sweet cities to capture rare and powerful creatures. Use your skills to capture Tokiros before they escape!

Quests and Events:

Complete epic missions and face formidable bosses in a dynamic world filled with events. Prove that you are the best summoner!

If you're a fan of creature-capturing and strategic battle games, Tokiros offers a unique exploration and combat experience that will keep you playing for hours on end!

name: Tokiros
short_description: In Tokiros, explore a vast world filled with unique creatures to capture and train! Build your team, face your enemies in challenging tactical battles. Uncover secrets and prove that you're the best summoner in this thrilling creature-capturing and deck-building game!
